items.1: Install a self-custodial wallet. Recommended: <rabby>Rabby Wallet</rabby>. Always download from the official site to avoid phishing.
items.2: Create an account on a reputable exchange (recommended: <kraken>Kraken</kraken>) and purchase ETH.
items.5: Bridge & swap using a trusted aggregator such as <jumper>Jumper Exchange</jumper>: swap from ETH on Arbitrum to USDT0 on HyperEVM (the vault’s underlying). Also bridge a small amount of HYPE (e.g., ~$10) for gas on HyperEVM.

about.title: About
about.body: MYRMIDONS USDT0 PHALANX allocates liquidity across selected Morpho markets on HyperEVM to capture yield while respecting strict risk limits.

metrics.title: Key metrics
metrics.yieldHint: APY is computed on-chain and may vary.

actions.bridgeCta: Need funds on HyperEVM? Bridge from Arbitrum via Jumper
